channel.title: Life on Xu Xu
channel.description: Recent content in Life on Xu Xu

item.title: My New Life
item.description: June 30, I left my school after graduation. I have no permission to re-enter my dorm. July 3, I started my new life working at Microsoft and living in my rented house with a roommate who was my roommate at school. Nothing really changed so far. I often go back to school to be with my girlfriend. I can still read books in the library and have lunch in canteen.
